direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle whitespace normalization with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods deal with string processing and whitespace handling, though they perform different operations.
Both methods manipulate strings and handle collections of strings, though they serve different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: The StringBuilder needs to be borrowed before normalizing whitespace.

The StringBuilder needs to be released after normalization is complete.
